text: unhen seedhee dagar par laga dena, aapaka daayitv nahin, parantu allaah jise chaahe, seedhee dagar par laga deta hai tatha tum jo bhee daan dete ho, to apane laabh ke lie dete ho tatha tum allaah kee prasannata praapt karane ke lie hee dete ho tatha tum jo bhee daan doge, tumhen usaka bhar poor pratiphal (badala) diya jaayega aur tumapar atyaachaar[1] nahin kiya jaayega
